S.FORM: Madagascar hya' ga cyux maki' tay 20 00 S, 47 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 587,041 sq km (maki' tay 47ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 581,540 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 5,501 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 24,430,325. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 71.10 , lhlahuy hya' ga 21.50 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 7.40 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Antananarivo. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 26 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Hery Rajaonarimampianina, aring ryax 25 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 2014 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
